name: @outfitter/contracts-zod
description: Zod helpers that integrate with @outfitter/contracts Result and AppError types.

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir=dist --format=esm --sourcemap=external && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && rm -f dist/env.js dist/error.js
scripts.dev: bun build src/index.ts --outdir=dist --format=esm --sourcemap=external --watch && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && rm -f dist/env.js dist/error.js
